DOC.brief_title: Intrauterine Embryo Development With ANECOVA Device
DOC.criteria: Women age 37 Hormonal serum level within normal range ( FSH , LH , E2 , PRL , P4 , T4 , TSH ) Negative serologic screen HIV , Hep B C No uterine ovarian alteration find ultrasound Normal BMI ( 19 29 kg/m2 ) . At least 8 stage MII oocytes retrieve Endometriosis PCO Severe male factor partner
